description:
Randomization is a free random number generator based on the Random.Org APIs which bases it's numbers of off atmospheric noise. With Randomization you can generate a single number, a series of numbers, coin flips, or lottery picks.

Typical numbers you generate from a random number generators are not actually random. They are what is known as pseudo-random. Pseudo-random numbers are generated using mathematical formulas to appear as if they are random numbers but they are actually not random.

So Randomization offers you true random numbers based on Random.Org's service which generates random numbers based on atmospheric noise.

For the time being this application requires an Internet connection. In future releases this application will allow you to switch between pseudo-random and true random numbers.
